I feel dirty. A dirty lil cat.

I cannot recommend this game at all.

      I've had this game since release and i have ended up uninstalling multiple times and quit for months on end over the years for some very basic reasons and my most recent match has made me quit once again. Almost every match in the last couple of days has just been utterly terrible. Killers are mostly just AFK which makes the match pointless and no fun, or survivors who are all rank 1 I've had the pleasure of playing with are just bum rushing at the killer to get insta killed, or two of them are doing it to farm points on one another(getting downed while the other heals that downed player repeatedly and vice versa). Oh hell i forgot the people who intentionally lead the killer to the other players who actually want to play the game! And how about those rage quitters who ruin a game because they leave after getting on their first hook 3 minutes in? so much fun!

      This game used to be actually decent until this garbage gameplay started popping up and it sucks you cant even really report someone without having video proof of it and submitting it on their website. Which in return makes the report system in the game absolutely useless.
This game is mostly only fun with friends at this point or if you are so utterly bored like me sometimes. Do not recommend if you want to play solo as a survivor because it will ruin your day.

the game is full of hackers. no kidding i am waiting for a similar game and i will uninstall this game asap. yay 

most of the hackers aren't even pretend they didn't use hack. they just use it like it's the right thing to do in this game. and maybe the reason is there's no competition for this kind of game atm

so hacker is allow in this game

I've been playing DbD for a long time now, over 800 hours. If I'm honest, I don't enjoy it anymore. Basically, the idea behind the game and the gameplay is great. However, now I have to say that I don't enjoy it anymore. Most killers are so overpowered that you as a survivor are not
Have more chance. The survivors' talents, on the other hand, are simply too weak. I would like the developers to bring more balance again. Because it's basically a great game.
I like how it has helped me create a fun community on discord, just by finding random people or other twitch streamers!

I'm enjoying the game so far, killers are 80% respectful, but there are the few camps/focuses.
I never write reviews, but I just wanted to state something that annoys me.
Audio Settings:
I believe there should be more than just 1 Audio setting, because when I'm in game, it's Quiet, I'm listening for Gens and Heartbeats, and then as soon as I go back to the Menu, I'm deaf. I'd be much happier having a separate Audio setting for the Menu, than In-Game, you know, where sound is actually important. 
This is mainly because I play almost every game without sound, but I'm aware it's a big part of this game. However I don't want sound in the Menu, because there's a big difference between the sounds in-game, and the Menu sounds.
So having more than just 1 Audio setting like almost every other game has, would be a great relief.

9/10

I loved this game until I met cheaters,that ruined my match.The ranking system is so stupid,for example I have Ash IV(rank 20)and the game give me player with iridescent 1(rank 1),that being very annoying.I would overlook the problem with the ranking system but cheaters are a big problem on PC,that's why I can't play this game anymore.
If you like an unbalanced mess with a toxic community that's sometimes super fun, then this is the game for you

Obviously I played a crap ton of hours on this game because i love watching it and being part of the experience as a viewer. Mixed feelings about the game cause regardless of your role, the game is tough and the algorithm generally pits you against HARDER players who know how to track and kill you  (not factoring the 70% of killers being campers or tunnelers), or bully you as a squad if youre a killer. I hate playing with random people, love playing it with my friends - this game is actually VERY FUN if you play custom matches with your friends. You don't lose your mind over the crap that comes your way when playing with strangers. I will say, it is easier playing as survivor even though I die 90% of the time - being a killer is VERY HARD so props to the killers who can 2K without being a cheap or toxic player. To get a solid handling of the game, you need to play at least 20 hours before you can fully understand the killer's abilities and range, and the understanding of the maps to be able to navigate as a "smart" player. if you want to keep your sanity, dont spend over 60 hrs especially if 1/3 of it is in the lobby waiting for a game to queue up

全部是组排人皇，装备6的一逼，我选屠夫，就算开局先瞄准一个人往死了干也不行，挂钩子守人都很难守的住，两个人同时来救，要么其中一个人挨一刀，要么直接拉到肩上一换一。更傻逼的设定是人被救后在几秒内有一个无敌，砍一刀不倒地，浑身冒白光，还跑的更快。真尼玛牛逼。以前感觉人皇最恶心的技能就是毁灭打击，结果现在又有一个技能砍一刀不倒还蹿的更快。修电机基本上没有一丝技术含量，怪不得一直说有屠夫挂机刷血点，那就对了。傻逼策划弄的人皇一个比一个牛逼的，一个个的又是这道具又是那道具的，屠夫玩儿的这么心累，不挂机挂啥，挂策划你妈？真鸡巴恶心人，平衡烂透，打cs去了，cs好，我打cs从不挂机，cs策划么么哒，爱你哟

Dead by Daylight is a fun-balanced game. I suggest playing it with online companions and I do think there are updates that the game requires to make it less repetitive, but other than that it is addicting and worth the money.

The game has...issues...and a lot of them...but at the end of the day, i can somewhat ignore those issues and still enjoy the game for what it is. No other horror game has managed to bring so many iconic horror figures into one game at once (Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Leatherface, Ghostface etc.).

Out of all the 4v1 horror games that exist out there, Dead by Daylight is still one of the best ones. I think you will enjoy this game, though for how long...well...that's entirely up to you
